title: As much as I love that you're "improving" Pentakill Morde's model, I don't really like the helmet
body:
https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-mQbb75ag7IQ/WXe_aKd5wQI/AAAAAAAAqA4/6CEnbQ1YgU0H3xvxPMuC3OA5retgzBRkwCEwYBhgL/s1600/mordeturn.png

I love how the skin was modernized but the orange tips on the helmet look/feel out of place and make him look overly goofy.
I know that you wanted to go with the molten metal/flame theme for his look but he just doesn't pull it off, not with that old Rig.

So, could we please just leave the helmet a uniform Grey/Silver?
Overall the skin looks so much better but the horns are really off-putting

replies.body: and were is the fire cape?
{{item:3068}} Here it is ;3
Who needs a cape when you have long hair :)
Let's compromise and just set the hair on fire. :D
he has to beat jad first

Those bug eyes lmao

'whose a cute lil death king'

Yeah, Morde was like the edgiest champion when the average champion looked like Fiddle/Ryze/Pantheon.  Now they're making things like Kayn that's two edgelords for the price of one and we have titans like Hecarim and Nautilus in the game that make Morde look like an ant in scale.

Hey folks,

We appreciate the feedback! I grabbed your feedback and brought it back to the team for discussion this morning, and we're all aligned with swapping his helmet back to the silver that it was before. 

We had wanted to better align his model with the splash, but without having VFX support, it came out looking less than optimal. 

You'll see these changes hitting PBE Monday. :)
Will you make it the same (bronze-ish) color as the spikes on his shoulder pads?
It'll be more aligned with them, yes.
Perhaps it's just a temporary change until his VGU. Give them time, perhaps they'll remove the molten tips (unless they'll do it later in the PBE) and give him the rockin' fire cape.
I've given them over 6 months for a bug fix. How much time are we talking 2020?

The eyes look goofy as well, like they're facing opposite directions.

Meh, I honestly don't mind the horns at all... They look mostly fine, however I find the eyes a bit too big and not... well... edgy enough (for a lack of a better word) They are tad too rounded.

Yeah..well at least this is something even i can agree on.

I am more concerned about the light purple tone and brown for a metal skin... It does not feel metal, when it should feel "METAL AF!" for Mordekaiser. I mean... Blue/purple shoulderpads? Brown leather gloves? Orange helmet? I would be fine with the orange part if it was animated, then it would be more of a homage to Rammstein and their insane pyro fireworks for their costumes or something along those lines. It becomes even more apparent when the new Pentakill Kayle skin is done so well in all black : /

I have the same opinion about Karthus, Mordekaiser and Yorick too: they go too far away from the all-black metal look.
Bring them back... BACK IN BLACK!
**#PentakillBackInBlack**
